hex
Class hexCell

java.lang.Object
  online.game.cell<FINALTYPE>
      online.game.chipCell<hexCell,hexChip>
          hex.hexCell
All Implemented Interfaces:
HexConstants, online.common.DrawableSprite, online.common.PlayConstants, online.game.Play2Constants
public class hexCell
extends online.game.chipCell<hexCell,hexChip>
implements HexConstants

specialized cell used for the game hex, not for all games using a hex board.

the game hex needs only a single object on each cell, or empty.

Author:
ddyer
See Also:
chipCell, stackCell

public boolean sameCell(hexCell other)
sameCell is called at various times as a consistency check

Overrides:
sameCell in class online.game.cell<hexCell>

other -
Returns:
true if this cell is in the same location as other (but presumably on a different board)

reInit

public void reInit()
reset back to the same state as when newly created. This is used when reinitializing a board.

Overrides:
reInit in class online.game.chipCell<hexCell,hexChip>

Digest

public long Digest()
wrap this method if the cell holds any additional state important to the game. This method is called, without a random sequence, to digest the cell in it's usual role. this method can be defined as G.Error("don't call") if you don't use it or don't want to trouble to implement it separately.

Overrides:
Digest in class online.game.chipCell<hexCell,hexChip>
Returns:
an integer

Digest

public long Digest(java.util.Random r)
wrap this method if the cell holds any additional state important to the game. This method is called, with a random sequence, to digest the cell in unusual roles, or when the diest of contents is complex.

Overrides:
Digest in class online.game.chipCell<hexCell,hexChip>
Parameters:
r - the current random sequence
Returns:
an integer
